Corpus: Open Richly Annotated Cuneiform Corpus, Korp Version
Description: This corpus contains cuneiform texts from Ancient history.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.

This corpus consists of 820 texts spanning between the beginnings of the Ancient Greek literary tradition (Homer) to the fifth century AD. The texts are sourced from the Perseus Canonical Greek Lit Repository, "The Little Sailing" digital library, and the Bibliotheca Augustana digital library.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from Figshare.
This corpus contains texts from the 4th to the 16th century.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the clarin:el repository.
This corpus contains fictional and non-fictional texts from the Medieval and Modern Chinese periods.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.
This corpus contains 1,000 letters from the 17th to the 18th century.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.
This corpus contains texts from the 13th century.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Instituut voor de Nederlandse Taal and through a dedicated concordancer.
This corpus contains dialogues from literary and didactic works from 1560 to 1760.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: Corpus of Early English Correspondence Sampler (CEECS)
Description: This corpus contains 1147 letters from 1418 to 1680.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: Corpus of Late Modern English prose / David Denison
Description: This corpus contains fictional texts from 1837 to 1926.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.
This corpus contains parliamentary debates from 1803 to 2005.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.
This corpus contains personal correspondence from 1540 to 1750.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.

Corpus: Older Scottish texts : the Edinburgh DOST corpus / A.J. Aitken, Paul Bratley and Neil Hamilton-Smith
Description: This corpus contains texts from 1450 to 1600.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: Pamphlets of the American Revolution : [selections] / edited by Bernard Bailyn
Description: This corpus contains pamphlets of the American Revolution from 1750 to 1776.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: Parsed Corpus of Early English Correspondence (PCEEC)
Description: This corpus contains correspondence from around 1410 to 1681.#SEPThis corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Annotation: PoS-tagged using PennTreebank tagset, lemmatised, normalised
Description: This corpus contains articles from the  Philosophical Transactions of the Royal Society of London journal from 1665 to 1869.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN-D repository as well as through a concordancer.

Corpus: The English language of the north-west in the late Modern English period: a Corpus of late 18c Prose
Description: This corpus contains texts from 1761 to 1790.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: The Lampeter Corpus of Early Modern English Tracts
Description: This corpus contains tracts from 1640 to 1740.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.
This corpus contains two collections of English newsbooks from 1654 to 1655.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: Corpus of Historical American English - Kielipankki Korp version 2017H1
Description: This corpus contains texts from 1810 to 2009.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.

Corpus: The Corpus of Late Modern English Texts, version 3.1
Description: This corpus contains texts written by British and Irish authors from 1710 to 1920.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from a CLARIN-D repository.

Annotation: detailed sociobiographical, pragmatic and textual annotation
Description: This corpus contains proceedings of the Old Bailey (i.e., legal documents) from 1674 to 1913.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN-D repository and through the CQPConcordancer.#SEPFor the corpus manual, see Huber et al. (2016).
This corpus contains Biblical and fictional texts from 730 to 1710.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: The York-Helsinki parsed corpus of Old English poetry (YCOEP)
Description: This corpus contains poems from 730 to 1710.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Annotation: tokenised, 16.-18. century texts have been tagged with contemporary Estonian, morphological and language information. 19. century texts are unannotated.
Description: This corpus covers secular and religious texts from the 16th to the 18th century.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.

Corpus: Classics of Finnish Literature, Kielipankki Version
Description: This corpus contains literary texts from 1880 to 1949.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.
This corpus contains literary texts from 1543 to 1810.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.
This corpus contains books published up to 1925 that are made available through the Gutenberg project.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.

Corpus: The Finnish Sub-corpus of the Newspaper and Periodical Corpus of the National Library of Finland, Kielipankki Version
Description: This corpus contains newspaper articles from 1840 to 2011.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.

Corpus: The Morpho-Syntactic Database of Mikael Agricola's Works
Annotation: tokenised, PoS-tagged, morphological components and syntactic function
Description: This corpus contains texts from 1544 to 1551 written by the clergyman Mikael Agricola.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.

Corpus: Virtual Old Literary Finnish (VVKS) - Kielipankki Korp version
Description: This corpus contains literary texts from 1543 to 1791.

Corpus: Partonopeus de Blois: transcriptions of all manuscripts and fragments
Description: This corpus contains transcriptions of the manuscripts and fragments of the romance Partonopeus de Blois.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: Syntactic Reference Corpus of Medieval French
Description: This corpus contains texts from the 9th to the 13th century.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from a dedicated webpage.
This corpus contains sermons from 1650 to 1750.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.
This corpus contains newspaper texts from 1945 to 1994.#SEPThe corpus is available through a concordancer provided by CLARIN-D.
This corpus contains texts from the 17th to the 20th century.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.
This corpus contains texts from 1842 to 1921.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Deutsches Text Archiv and through a concordancer.

Corpus: Dinglers Polytechnisches Journal (Polytechnical Journal of Dingler)
Description: This corpus contains academic texts from 1820 to 1931.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Deutsches Text Archiv and through a concordancer.

Annotation: TEI Lite markup, no linguistic annotation
Description: This corpus contains medical writing from 1500 to 1700.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: GerManC. A Historical Corpus of German Newspapers 1650-1800
Description: This corpus contains personal letters, sermons and fictional, scholarly (i.e., humanities), scientific and legal texts from 1650 to 1800.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: Mannheimer Korpus Historischer Zeitungen und Zeitschriften
Description: This corpus contains texts from the 18th and 19th centuries.#SEPThe corpus is available for download directly through the VLO.

Corpus: Referenzkorpus Mittelhochdeutsch (Middle High German Reference Corpus)
Annotation: tokenised, PoS-tagged, lemmatised, normalised, morphosyntactic description
Description: This corpus contains texts from 1050 to 1350.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Deutsches Text Archiv and through a concordancer.

This corpus contains sermons from an Upper German (Balvarian-Alemannic) dialect area.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the repository of the University of Hamburg and through the ANNIS environment.

Annotation: tokenised, tagged for clause type and grammatical function
Description: This corpus contains texts from a journey diary from 1350.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the repository of the University of Hamburg and through the ANNIS environment.

Corpus: Reference Corpus Middle Low German/Low Rhenish (1200-1650)
Description: This corpus contains texts from the 13th century to the middle of the 17th century.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the repository of the University of Hamburg through the ANNIS environment.

Annotation: PoS-tagged using the STTS tagset, lemmatised, normalised
Description: This corpus contains historical cookbook recipes from  1569 to 1800, as well as contemporary ones from 2012.#SEPThe corpus is available through the CQPweb concordancer provided by CLARIN-D.
This corpus contains historic academic texts.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the clarin:el repository.
This corpus contains historical texts from the 18th century to the 2000s.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.
This corpus contains Old Icelandic (Old Norse) Narrative texts from the 13th to the 15th century.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from CLARIN-IS and for search through the concordancer Korp.

This corpus contains Italian language newspapers published in the United States between 1898 and 1920. The corpus includes seven Italian language newspapers published in California, Massachusetts, Pennsylvania, Vermont, and West Virginia. The collection includes the following titles: L’Italia, Cronaca sovversiva, La libera parola, The patriot, La ragione, La rassegna, and La sentinella del West Virginia.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the repository of the University of Utrecht.

This corpus consists of Latin texts from the 2nd century B.C. to the 21st century. Non-linguistic metadata include information on genre, title, century and specific date.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from LINDAT and for search online through Sketch Engine.
This corpus contains Medieval Nordic texts.#SEPThe corpus is available for download and through the concordancer Corpuscle.
This corpus contains newspaper articles from 1945 to 1954.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.
This corpus contains essays, news articles, and scientific and literary texts from 1963 to 1967.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: Corpus of biblical text in Scots / John Kirk
Description: This corpus contains Biblical texts.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: The Helsinki corpus of Older Scots : [1450-1700]
Description: This corpus contains texts of different domains and genres (e.g., burgh records, diaries, pamphlets, scientific treatises, sermons) from 1450 to 1700.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: Digital library and corpus of historical Slovene IMP 1.1
Description: This corpus contains 658 unique texts from 1584 to 1919.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository and through the concordancer KonText.

Corpus: Reference corpus of historical Slovene goo300k 1.2
Annotation: manually tokenised, lemmatised, PoS-tagged, modern synonyms for archaic words
Description: This corpus contains 89 unique texts from 1584 to 1899.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN.SI repository and through the concordancer KonText.

Corpus: The Swedish Sub-corpus of the Newspaper and Periodical Corpus of the National Library of Finland, Kielipankki Version
Description: This corpus contains newspaper articles from 1770 to 1950.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.
